app_descript:
App Name: ZEIL
App Package Name: ai.zeil.android

Brief: ZEIL revolutionizes the job search and application process with its swipe-based, user-friendly technology. Tailored specifically for the modern job seeker, ZEIL provides a seamless way to discover jobs, track applications, and craft professional CVs all within one intuitive app. It is designed to assist users every step of the way, from selecting the most fitting job to creating a standout CV that gets noticed by potential employers.

Core Features:

  • ğŸ“² Swipe-Based Interaction: Engage with job listings through a simple swipe to pass, save, or apply for positions.
  • ğŸ’¼ Personalized Job Feed: Receive job recommendations that match your profile and preferences.
  • ğŸ” Advanced Search Filters: Find jobs by salary, work style, benefits, and company culture to ensure the perfect match.
  • ğŸ“ Application Tracking: Keep track of your job applications, from saved to applied, within the app.
  • âœï¸ Step-by-Step CV Builder: Utilize the CV builder with prompts and employer-approved templates to showcase your professionalism.

Pros:

  • ğŸ‘¥ Direct Chat with Employers: Companies can initiate conversations directly within the app for quick interview scheduling.
  • ğŸ¯ Tailored Applications: Customize your CVs, cover letters, and even video introductions for each job application.
  • ğŸš€ Rapid CV Creation: With over 200 prompts and suggested skills, create a high-quality CV efficiently.
  • ğŸ”„ Easy Profile Updates: Add new skills, accomplishments, or courses to your CV in real-time, on-the-go.

Cons:
